name: swift-command
title: Swift Command
description: Efficiently manage and access Linux command snippets for faster execution
author: aaron_lin

preferences.name: datasourcePath
preferences.title: Data Source File
preferences.description: If no file is assigned, one will be automatically created in the support directory

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
